text: Small practical question about registration of new package. Is the 3 days wait time exactly 72 hours? Just to know if I wait patiently a couple of minutes more or I just forget about it for today :stuck_out_tongue:

elements.text: Small practical question about registration of new package. Is the 3 days wait time exactly 72 hours? Just to know if I wait patiently a couple of minutes more or I just forget about it for today

text: I think it isn't exactly. If I remember correctly there are merging cycles every couple of minutes so maybe it 72hours + 15 minutes. But there is probably someone else who knows it better :smile:
